did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Virginia Real Estate Appraiser Board,

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The nine member Real Estate Appraiser Board was established in 1990. The Board has legislative authority to establish all educational requirements and regulations for the real estate appraiser profession and all enforcement of "standards of professional appraiser" as cited in section 54.1-2013 the code of Virginia. The Real Estate Appraiser Board presently licenses over 3000 individuals and firms. The Boards purpose is to regulate individuals and firms that perform estimates on the value of real estate property. The Board also is responsible for certifying instructors of Real Estate Appraisers profession. The Board requires licensures for the following professional titles; Appraiser Trainee, Licensed Residential Appraiser, Certified Residential Appraiser and Certified General Appraiser.

odd.p: These records are part of the Virginia Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation record group (RG 17)

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Real Estate Appraiser Board, Minutes, 1990-2006. Accession 42993, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 42993 was transferred by Borkey, Alexia, M., 11/27/2006

scopecontent.p: Includes official minutes and related attachments of the Virginia Real Estate Appraiser Board. May also include informal fact finding conference records and conflict of interest statements.
